title: Stocks to Watch: Hero Moto, Vedanta, Lupin, Future Retail, ONGC, Tech M - Business Standard
content: Stocks to Watch: Hero Moto, Vedanta, Lupin, Future Retail, ONGC, Tech M  Business Standard
description: The SGX Nifty futures were quoting at 17,431 levels at 7:30 am, hinting at a gap-down start of 100 points on the Nifty50.
